articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: President Trump fires Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden - NPR
articles.description: Hayden, who became the first woman and the first African American to serve as the Librarian of Congress when she was appointed in 2016, was abruptly fired via email late Thursday.
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump abruptly fired Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden on Thursday as the White House continues to purge the federal government of those perceived to oppose the president… [+5265 chars]

articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: How Operation Sindoor brought justice for beheaded American journalist Daniel Pearl - Times of India
articles.description: US News: India's 'Operation Sindoor,' launched after the Pahalgam attack, has struck a JeM facility in Bahawalpur, potentially delivering justice in the 2002 D
